Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class FaithTrack.VaticanSection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.FaithTrack.VaticanSection
Enclosing class:
FaithTrack
public static class FaithTrack.VaticanSection extends EventDispatcher
This class represents a Vatican Section in the Faith Track.

  • Constructor Details

    • VaticanSection

      public VaticanSection​(int id, int faithPointsBeginning, int faithPointsEnd, int victoryPoints)
      Constructor of the Vatican Section.
      Parameters:
      faithPointsBeginning - the first tile of the Vatican Section, which needs to be reached in order to earn bonus points
      faithPointsEnd - the last tile of the Vatican Section, which needs to be reached in order to activate a Vatican report
      victoryPoints - the corresponding quantity of bonus points that will be rewarded to the players after the Report is over
      See Also:
      FaithTrack.VaticanSection

      Returns:

    • getFaithPointsEnd

      public int getFaithPointsEnd()
      Returns the last tile of the Vatican Section, which needs to be reached in order to activate a Vatican report.
      Returns:
      the faith points

    • getVictoryPoints

      public int getVictoryPoints()
      Returns the corresponding quantity of bonus points that will be rewarded to the players after the Report is over.
      Returns:
      the victory points

    • isActivated

      public boolean isActivated()
      Returns whether the Vatican Section is activated.
      Returns:
      true if the Vatican Section is activated; false otherwise.

    • activate
